location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of the Persia-Iraq Frontier

mods.abstract: Sketch map indicating the international boundaries between Iraq, Persia [Iran], Turkey, and Azerbaijan. The boundaries are shown as red lines, with country names annotated in red ink. Major settlements are indicated in English in black ink. Important railways and rivers are also indicated in black ink.No date is indicated on the map, which is included amongst (but not specifically referred to in) correspondence and other papers dated 1927.
